title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. I, ch. V, subch. B, pt. 456 - Youthful Operator's Snowmobile Educational Program
content:

§ 456.1 - Requirements for obtaining a snowmobile safety certificate

§ 456.3 - Instructor certification
§ 456.4 - Application for snowmobile safety certificate

§ 456.6 - Duplicate snowmobile safety certificate
§ 456.7 - Revocation and suspension

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. I, ch. V, subch. B, pt. 456

Statutory authority: PRHPL, §§25.01[6], 25.19

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
